column5: Does anyone know if there are any kids fishing derbies around SW Ontario that aren't happening on the family fishing weekend? We have to go to a wedding out of town that weekend so my son will miss out on most of the kids derbies (not to mention a soccer tourney/funday, and his friends birthday) We live in London but are willing to travel an hour or two.  Thanks in advance,  jjcanoe & jjcanoe jr.
There is one coming up at Valens conservation area. I believe it is on the 12th of July.
Thanks Jedi I'll look into that one, but I'm building a deck that weekend as well so it might be a bit tight,  If you hear of any others let me know.  Thanks,  jjcanoe
The Grand river bass derby has a category for under 16, it is this coming weekend but the prizes get lamer every year.
thanks I'll look into that one as well.  jjcanoe
